remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为所有 ASP.NET 移动控件的基类类主要包含所有控件共有的样式和上下文信息。As the base class for all ASP.NET mobile controls, the class primarily contains style and context information common to all controls. 有关样式和上下文信息的详细信息，请参阅和类。For more information about style and context information, see the and classes. > [!NOTE] > 因为此类派生自 ASP.NET基类，所有基类属性、 方法和事件均位于每个移动控件。Because this class derives from the ASP.NET base class, all base class properties, methods, and events are available in each of the mobile controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当窗体包含激活而无需从服务器交互的另一种形式的导航元素时，则认为链接窗体。When a form contains navigation elements that activate another form without interaction from the server, it is considered a linked form. 有几个标准窗体，才能被视为链接。There are several criteria for a form to be considered linked. 例如，如果满足以下三个条件，窗体 B 被视为要链接到窗体：For example, if the following three conditions are met, Form B is considered to be linked to Form A: - 窗体包含目标为 B 窗体Form A contains a with its destination as Form B. - 窗体的不包含事件处理程序。Form A does not contain an event handler. - 窗体 B 没有事件处理程序。Form B has no event handler. 基实现不执行任何操作，但其他控件，如，重写默认实现。The base implementation does nothing, but other controls, such as the , override the default implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与其他属性，不同属性不继承自其父级。Unlike the other properties, the property is not inherited from its parent. 例如，如果您设置为父控件，子控件上的蓝绿色属性将不会继承的蓝绿色背景色; 您必须显式设置子控件的属性设置为蓝绿色，也必须设属性控件的父级，并将样式表应用于子控件。For example, if you set the property to cyan on a parent control, a child control will not inherit a background color of cyan; you must explicitly set the child control's property to cyan, or you must set the property of the parent control and apply the style sheet to the child control. 这是与级联样式表的行为保持一致。This is consistent with the behavior of cascading style sheets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移动控件，如，可以重写此方法以确定这是否是用于提交窗体的控件。Mobile controls, such as the , can override this method to determine whether this is a control used for form submission. 其他控件可以通过提供逻辑以编程方式确定是否必须是扩展`submit`控制，例如，通过检查为特定的属性。Other controls can be extended by providing logic to programmatically determine whether or not they must be `submit` controls, for example, by checking for specific properties. > [!NOTE] > 一个控件被视为可某个控件，仅当它实现了捕获回发事件的方法。A control is considered to be a form-submit control only if it implements method to capture the postback event. 否则，它未注册的默认事件处理程序，即使该方法将返回`true`。Otherwise, it is not registered for the default event handler, even if the method returns `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法通知服务器控件，它应与，例如设置数据库查询相关联的页执行普遍适用于每个 HTTP 请求的操作。This method notifies the server control that it should perform actions common to each HTTP request for the page it is associated with, such as setting up a database query. 在此阶段在页面生命周期中，创建和初始化服务器控件层次结构中的、 还原视图状态，和窗体控件反映客户端的数据。At this stage in the page lifecycle, server controls in the hierarchy are created and initialized, view state is restored, and form controls reflect client-side data. 使用属性来确定响应客户端回发而加载页面还是正对其进行加载和访问第一次。Use the property to determine whether the page is being loaded in response to a client postback, or if it is being loaded and accessed for the first time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以重写此方法来存储私有视图状态。You can override this method to store a private view state. 除了与普通的视图状态一起保存的信息，ASP.NET 移动 Web 窗体存储信息，如在窗体进行分页。In addition to information saved with the ordinary view state, ASP.NET mobile Web Forms store information such as whether or not the form is paginated. 这添加信息存储在私有视图状态，并存储在客户端而不是在服务器上。This added information is stored in the private view state and is stored on the client rather than the server. 私有视图状态保存在优化的方式。A private view state is saved in an optimized manner. 默认行为，例如活动窗体，使第一个窗体永远不会包含在已保存的私有视图状态中。Default behavior, such as making the first form the active form, is never included in the saved private view state.
